user.title: Configure Sorel Connect
user.description: Set up your Sorel Connect integration to connect to your MQTT broker and Sorel devices.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your MQTT broker
data_description.port: The port your MQTT broker is listening on (usually 1883)
data_description.username: Username for MQTT authentication (leave empty if not required)
data_description.password: Password for MQTT authentication (leave empty if not required)
data_description.broker_tls: Enable TLS/SSL encryption for MQTT connection
data_description.topic_prefix: MQTT topic prefix used by your Sorel devices
data_description.auto_onboard: Automatically create sensors for newly discovered devices
data_description.api_server: Server hostname for device metadata API
data_description.api_url: URL template for fetching device metadata

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to MQTT broker
